name: Gem Wars: Attack of the Jiblets

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Queen Birdface Productions/Gem Wars Attack of the Jiblets/bin/release/Gem Wars.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Queen Birdface Productions/Gem Wars Attack of the Jiblets/bin/release/Gem
    Wars.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    args: /s /nr
    executable: $CACHE/Gem Wars Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
